frontmatter.title: DynamoDb OnDemand Hydrator
frontmatter.spoiler: At Uniplaces we use a DynamoDB as our main database. DynamoDB is NoSQL and distributed database from Amazon webservices that automatically spreads the data and traffic for the table over a sufficient number of servers to handle the request capacity specified by the customer and the amount of data stored, while maintaining consistent and fast performance.
